Waymo's self-driving cars have begun operations in NYC, raising concerns among taxi drivers, while city lawmakers push for safer intersections amid rising traffic fatalities, and Mayor-elect Mamdani outlines plans for universal child care and affordable housing initiatives.

### Risks & Alerts

- Waymo’s self-driving cars hit NYC streets, raising safety concerns for taxi drivers.
